overview: At Salieri's Poker Club, nothing is more important than poker: the game, the adrenaline of bluffing of course. But more than anything, victory is paramount… Because the rules of the establishment are strict and irrevocable: only one bet, his own wife. The vanquished may sometimes join in the victory feast or settle in private. In addition, good customers who are disreputable in the eyes of the law are rewarded here in a very special way...
title: Salieri’s Poker Club
